availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Vincent Watson (Caldwell co., ky, farm laborer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Filed a marriage bond to Emmeline Morrow Watson in Princeton, Kentucky, on September 29, 1853. Father of Martha Watson and Willie Watson. Farm laborer in Long Pond in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 13.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546372, p. 194.
